fields.name: #1 - Be respectful
fields.value:
This includes personal insults, demeaning behavior, and inflammatory language. Know when a debate has turned into an argument. Above all else, listen and cooperate with staff members.
​

fields.name: #2 -No NSFW or illegal content
fields.value:
Don't post or discuss content of this nature. This includes porn, gore, pirated software, etc.
​

fields.name: #3 - No spamming or irrelevant messages
fields.value:
Sending an unreasonable amount of messages in a short time or ones that are unrelated or unwanted will result in disciplinary action. Abusing bots is considered spam.
​

fields.name: #4 - Use the channels as intended
fields.value:
Please read the channel topics before using them. Likewise, if the conversation you are having is more suited to one of the specific channels, please move it there.
​

fields.name: #5 - Don't link to or advertise other servers
fields.value:
If you want to spread the word about your server, do so elsewhere. Server invites will be deleted automatically.
​

fields.name: #6 - Don't use a selfbot
fields.value:
They are against the terms of service and often an annoyance to other users.
​

fields.name: Moderators have final say in the enforcement of these rules or other infractions.
fields.value: Don't attempt to loophole or use semantics to get around these rules. Respect the intent behind them, not the literal text.
